# r-badge

## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                 | Type                                                        | Default     |
| ---------- | ----------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `color`    | `color`     | Background color of the badge                                               | `string`                                                    | `undefined` |
| `hidden`   | `hidden`    | Hidden badge                                                                | `boolean`                                                   | `false`     |
| `isDot`    | `is-dot`    | If a little dot is displayed instead of value                               | `boolean`                                                   | `false`     |
| `max`      | `max`       | Maximum value, shows {max}+ when exceeded (only works if value is a number) | `number`                                                    | `99`        |
| `offset`   | --          | Offset of badge [x, y]                                                      | `[number, number]`                                          | `undefined` |
| `showZero` | `show-zero` | Whether to show badge when value is zero                                    | `boolean`                                                   | `true`      |
| `type`     | `type`      | Badge type                                                                  | `"danger" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `'danger'`  |
| `value`    | `value`     | Display value                                                               | `number \| string`                                          | `''`        |
